msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21 US Circuit Courts, Western District of Washington, Seattle; Law Register Northern Division, 1899-1906, vol 2

div1.p: United States District Court, District of Washington.
In the Matter of the application of Columbia George for a writ of Habeas Corpus
Filed in the U.S. Circuit Court, Western Dist. of Washington. SEP 10 1906. A Reeves Ayres, Clerk.
United States Circuit Court for the District of Washington
In the matter of the petition of Columbia George for a writ of Habeas Corpus No. 1390 Appealed June 1 06. Record sent June 19.

To the Clerk of the Entitled Court: You will please issue certified copy of opinon of Court in above cause also certificate showing that cause was appealed, and oath thereof, together with certified copy of citation upon appeal for use US Atty in appellate Court.
